website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a skate that will be fast in the rink, but is also durable enough to take on the streets, this skate will perform well.
pros: A quality skate at the price point
Very comfortable to wear and use
Smooth and quiet when you skate
Wheels can be changed when they wear out
cons: These skates are not going to have the smoothest wheels on the market because they are made to be able to endure outdoor conditions as well as the rink

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner skates
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner skates!! I use them to skate outdoors. The wheels that they come with are not good for skating on rough roads, so I purchased the Atom Pulse outdoor wheels. I love these skates! I normally wear men's size 8 or 8.5 shoes. I purchased the size 8 skates. They fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Socks

customer_reviews.title: Order a size larger.
customer_reviews.text: At the last minute I ordered a larger size. I'm so glad I did...they are great product, made very well, however now he will be able to wear them out instead of not being able to fit in them.
customer_reviews.author: BassetMomma

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these used (like new). I would never have guessed they were used. In original box. I wear a women's size 8.5-9. I bought the men's size 7. They feel a little too big. I should have gotten a 6 but I'm in love anyway!!
customer_reviews.author: Angeliki Kyros

customer_reviews.title: Worst skates I've ever tried
customer_reviews.text: Awful. Worst skates I've ever tried. Wheels pull to one side. Very wide, yet short. You need to go up a size in length and then end up with skates way too wide. Do not buy- especially for beginners bc they will hate skating if this is what they are introduced too. Luckily I could return them.
customer_reviews.author: Crich6

customer_reviews.title: A gift that keeps on giving!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for someone fairly new to indoor quad skating. 1000% better than rentals at the rink! He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: wallybowser

customer_reviews.title: i love these skates they skate really fast and i love ...
customer_reviews.text: i love these skates they skate really fast and i love that and i can ride them indoor and out i recomend you buy a pair of epic skates
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality skate for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a semi-pro skate. Certainly worked for my 7 year old granddaughter. Don't forget the wrist, elbow and knee pads.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: These are quite durable! I ordered a size up for my growing boys and they are slightly large as expected. They love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I brought these skates for my 10 year old boy. He loves these skates. I had brought the same kind of skates from another place over 10 years ago and was really impressed with them and decided to purchase them again. Arrived earlier than date expected.
customer_reviews.author: llynch1874

customer_reviews.title: Size problem
customer_reviews.text: Runs big. I ordered a 7.5 and it was too big. But quality & design of it is real nice
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Terry

customer_reviews.title: Roller skates.
customer_reviews.text: Love the skates. Im female wear an 8 in womens got a 6 in these cause the mens.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old son is so happy with these skates. He never wants to take them off. These are great for walks around the block an skate night at the local skating rink I will definitely purchase more when he outgrows them.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella30

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Skates
customer_reviews.text: They're are comfortable and very easy to balance in. I bought a pair cause I just got a job at sonic as a skating car hop and I think they'll do the job just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy smith

customer_reviews.title: For some reason i could not return them the page kept saying sorry
customer_reviews.text: They fit ok I did not like the wheels I changed the wheels and cleaned the barrings they were dirty for being a new pair of skates
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They were the best skates I have ever had great for indoor and outdoor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great skate indoor
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter after wadting 40.00 on another pair that eas junk. These are made well great for inside and got them for 20.00 discounted but were brand new in box
customer_reviews.author: Shari Grand

customer_reviews.title: FIt as Described
customer_reviews.text: They did fit as describe, but I had to return the ones I got due to some loose stitching and glue. Not bad for the money, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: kutash

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new pair of skates for roller derby. I figured I’ll buy the used ones cause they’re gonna get scuffed up anyways during practices. I was beyond shocked , no scratches no sign of them ever being used or anything. They look brand new !
customer_reviews.author: Marci

customer_reviews.title: Great skates!
customer_reviews.text: Nice! Good price, great quality, fast shipping of course & the bday boy loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Boxed In

customer_reviews.title: Great gift! Will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter for Christmas. She absolutely loves them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Nana D
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves them!! He said they are comfortable and he likes to use them at the rink and the walking trail
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toe stop missing
customer_reviews.text: The skates were nice but I had to send back because the right skate was missing toe stop.
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These skates are great. Love how smooth and quiet they are. Used mainly for indoor skating activities...
customer_reviews.author: Eric H.

customer_reviews.title: Good value and price and received within 2 days
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for 15 year old granddaughter she absolutely loved them .
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wrong size... need to return and get the right size ...one size smaller
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Rice

customer_reviews.title: Epic
customer_reviews.text: I have only tried them on, I haven't skated in them yet since I need to find some place that will give lessons. So I can't really give a good rating yet, but they look nice and fit good.
customer_reviews.author: P. C. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really love this skates, they are awesome! Comfortable and great for beginners!! Recommended at 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Valeria

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son says it's hard to skate in them. He rather have the inline roller blades..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good skates for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 used pairs, one for me adult size 7 and one for my 5 year old son. Each pair was just $35 and skates were in great shape. Wheels are quite hard and are good for indoor. Skates are also comfortable and work well. We haven't yet tried them outdoor since we are still learning. only reason I am giving 4 stars and not 5 is because I have nothing to compare against.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous_1978

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outside
customer_reviews.text: These are my first skates. They came beautifully packaged and perfect. I just tested them out outside and so far so great! The wheels are chunky and hard. Maybe get a bigger stopper but it isn't necessary. They ran a lil big. I'm a women's 10 so I got an adult 8 and they're a lil roomy but that hasnt been an issue. Consider sizing down if you want a snug fit. Other than that I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Superhappy789

customer_reviews.title: They are good for outside recreational skating
customer_reviews.text: not suitable for roller derby. the boot is uncomfortable and cheaply made and the toe stops are too stiff and wear too fast. They are good for outside recreational skating, good for skate parks. Too overpriced for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: amymelissa

product_meta.title: Epic Skates Super Nitro Indoor/Outdoor Quad Speed Roller Skates
product_meta.description: Epic Super Nitro Quad Speed Skates are a fantastic choice whether you are just starting out or you're an intermediate skater. The Super Nitro combines quality and reliability all in one package! The new Super Nitro line of quad speed skates features a classic speed skate design with an adjustable speed strap and padded collar creating the perfect combination of comfort and support. The Super Nitro's come standard with our Indoor/Outdoor Polyurethane wheels making it easy to transition from skating at the local rink to hitting the sidewalk for a outdoor skate. All Epic Skates now come with two pair of laces!
feature_bullets: Epic Super nitro boots - Black with Silver trim - comfortable padded collar - Classic speed skate design with speed strap - man-made uppers
Epic nitro indoor outdoor speed skate wheels - Black with Black hubs
Epic nylon plates with double action trucks
